name: assignment
description: This repository is intended to create assignment by hotwax Step1- creating database using mysql Using Mysql on docker container. Staring containter - `docker pull mysql` `docker run --name my-mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -p 3306:3306 -d mysql` Connecting to sql using gui client `root` `password` creating a db CREATE DATABASE hotwax SHOW databases USE hotwax
